meta.desc: NoStuckPals - Attempts to resolve pals getting stuck in the base by re-scaling their invisible collision box

ScaleSize.name: Scale size
ScaleSize.desc: Smaller size to temporarily scale pal (and permanently collision box) to (1 = disable scaling)

RestoreDelay.name: Restore delay
RestoreDelay.desc: Delay (in ms) to scale pal (not collision box) back to original size (increase gradually if you experience tiny pals)

LogDebugInfo.name: Log debug info
LogDebugInfo.desc: true = Enable debug logging, false = Disable debug logging
